Code.description: The character code for the language (eg 'en', 'ru')

UserName.description: The username of the social media user

Id.description: The ID used by the social network to identify the post

Text.description: The text of the social media post.

Url.description: The URL to the social media post.

Score.description: The weighted confidence level that the item contains text contains the target language.

Percentage.description: The percentage of the total post text made in the target language
